capostone package

Submodules

capostone.asgi module

capostone.settings module

capostone.urls module

Project-level URL configuration.

This module defines the root URL routes for the project, including:

  • Django admin interface

  • Authentication system

  • Newsroom API endpoints

  • Newsroom app views (namespaced as articles)

capostone.urls.urlpatterns = [<URLResolver <URLPattern list> (admin:admin) 'admin/'>, <URLResolver <module 'django.contrib.auth.urls' from 'C:\\Users\\jankep\\OneDrive - SAOTA\\Desktop\\HyperionDev\\LEVEL 3\\Capstone_2025_10_02\\Task\\news_project\\myenv\\Lib\\site-packages\\django\\contrib\\auth\\urls.py'> (None:None) 'accounts/'>, <URLResolver <module 'newsroom.api.urls' from 'C:\\Users\\jankep\\OneDrive - SAOTA\\Desktop\\HyperionDev\\LEVEL 3\\Capstone_2025_10_02\\Task\\news_project\\newsroom\\api\\urls.py'> (None:None) 'api/'>, <URLResolver <module 'newsroom.urls' from 'C:\\Users\\jankep\\OneDrive - SAOTA\\Desktop\\HyperionDev\\LEVEL 3\\Capstone_2025_10_02\\Task\\news_project\\newsroom\\urls.py'> (articles:articles) ''>]

URL patterns for the project.
